strengths.description: The role of Product Architect for BTP applications demands deep expertise in the SAP BTP platform and its full range of capabilities.
I believe that those who can implement are best equipped to design and architect effective solutions.
OAuth2 using x509 certificates and enable automatic secret key rotation in SAP BTP Cloud Foundry.
Digitized internal infrastructure to enable integration with multiple on-premise ERP systems via Cloud Connectors.
Novo Nordisk is recognized for its exceptional standards in processes, practices, and technologyâ€”especially within the GxP framework.
Throughout most of my career I have always been keen to flexiblility and easy to maintain software.
Working as full-stack developer requires to be familiar with Web API.
Using tools like SAP BTP Logging to monitor applications.
For the majority of my career, I have taken advantage of its flexibility and capability for non-linear workflows.
I've always preferred working in an environment where tracking and resolving issues early in the development process is a top priority.
